name: Renewal of license
text: [§466D-10]  Renewal of license.  Licenses issued pursuant to this chapter shall be valid for three years and shall be renewed upon the payment of a renewal fee within sixty days before the expiration of the license.  Failure to renew a license shall result in forfeiture of that license.  Licenses that have been forfeited may be restored within one year of the forfeiture date upon payment of renewal and restoration fees.  Failure to restore a forfeited license within one year shall result in the automatic termination of the license.  A person whose license has been terminated pursuant to this section shall be required to reapply for a new license as a new applicant. [L 2010, c 178, pt of §2]
